item.title: Command wont work

item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Did you delete the code before that?It should look like this in your client.java with master.

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }

item.title: Command wont work
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Get rid of that command and search for “master”.

Then hit enter under the last } twice and paste this pickup code:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }

item.title: Command wont work

item.description:
@pablo2 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“That Item Doesn’t Exist.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Please try again?”);
}
}

} else {
